PERSONA:
meet sarah, a 56-year-old married woman living in a metropolitan area in the mountain region of the western united states. with some college education but no degree, sarah identifies as a white non-hispanic and was born in the u.s.

a devout member of the church of jesus christ of latter-day saints (mormon), sarah attends religious services once a week and holds very conservative political views, aligning herself with the republican party. her family income falls within the middle-income bracket, ranging from $50,000 to $60,000 annually.

sarah is an active member of her community, volunteering regularly. she is a registered voter and takes her civic duties seriously. technologically savvy, she frequently uses the internet several times a day.

despite her traditional values and religious beliefs, sarah embraces the diversity of her metropolitan surroundings. she is open-minded and respectful towards others, though she maintains her firm stance on personal and political matters. with a strong work ethic and dedication to her family, sarah strikes a balance between her responsibilities and her passions.
